content: yo and pull that tail through the last for the cowl lp of yarn a on your hook using a slip_stitch bind off all sts in pattern directions foundation round 1 with yarn a chain 89 being sure not to twist slip_stitch into the first chain made to make a circle begin working tunisian in the round by pulling up a loop in the bb of the second chain from the hook and in each chain across the row you will only get about half the stitches or less depending on the length of your double-ended hook onto reversible honeycomb cowl by snail + teacup designs llc all rights reserved 2
